passive.name: Aspiration
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer launches Follow-up ATK, additionally regenerates {{2}} Energy and gains "Presage," lasting for {{3}} turn(s). While the wearer has "Presage," all ally targets' CRIT DMG increases by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When entering battle, the wearer regenerates {{5}} Energy and gains "Presage," lasting for {{6}} turn(s).
